ud6.8:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
ud6.8:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena rajagahe dve puga annatarissa ganikaya saratta honti patibaddhacitta;
ud6.8:1.4: bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam panihipi upakkamanti, ledduhipi upakkamanti, dandehipi upakkamanti, satthehipi upakkamanti.
ud6.8:1.5: Te tattha maranampi nigacchanti maranamattampi dukkham.
ud6.8:2.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisimsu.
ud6.8:2.2: Rajagahe pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
ud6.8:2.3: Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud6.8:3.1: “Idha, bhante, rajagahe dve puga annatarissa ganikaya saratta patibaddhacitta;
ud6.8:3.2: bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam panihipi upakkamanti, ledduhipi upakkamanti, dandehipi upakkamanti, satthehipi upakkamanti.
ud6.8:3.3: Te tattha maranampi nigacchanti maranamattampi dukkhan”ti.
ud6.8:4.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
ud6.8:5.1: “Yanca pattam yanca pattabbam, ubhayametam rajanukinnam, aturassanusikkhato.
ud6.8:5.2: Ye ca sikkhasara silabbatam jivitam brahmacariyam upatthanasara, ayameko anto.
ud6.8:5.5: Iccete ubho anta katasivaddhana, katasiyo ditthim vaddhenti.
ud6.8:5.6: Etete ubho ante anabhinnaya oliyanti eke, atidhavanti eke.
ud6.8:5.7: Ye ca kho te abhinnaya tatra ca nahesum, tena ca namannimsu, vattam tesam natthi pannapanaya”ti.
